mapper.insert:
insert into resource_xb ( id, shape, area, perimeter, xbln, xblnId, xianju, xiangzhenchang, xingzhengcun, linbanhao, xiaobanhao, suoshuxian, suoshuxiangzhen, keyWord, mianji, tufuhao, guidaohao, jieshoushijian, senlinleibie, dilei, lindiquanshu, linmuquanshu, projectType, linzhong, shiquandengji, baohudengji, dimao, podu, powei, poxiang, qiyuan, youshishuzhong, lingzu, yubidu, jingjilinchanqi, meigongqingzhushu, meigongqingchuji, xiaobanchujiliang, sipangshuzhushu, sipangshuchuji, lvhuahzushu, lvhuachuji, sanshengmuzhushu, sanshengmuchuji, sanshengzhuzhushu, shidi, huangmoleixing, huangmochengdu, shahualeixing, shahuachengdu, shididengji, pointX, pointY, maxX, maxY, minX, minY ) values
( #{item.id}, GeomFromText(#{item.shape}), #{item.area}, #{item.perimeter}, #{item.xbln}, #{item.xblnId}, #{item.xianju}, #{item.xiangzhenchang}, #{item.xingzhengcun}, #{item.linbanhao}, #{item.xiaobanhao}, #{item.suoshuxian}, #{item.suoshuxiangzhen}, #{item.keyWord}, #{item.mianji}, #{item.tufuhao}, #{item.guidaohao}, #{item.jieshoushijian}, #{item.senlinleibie}, #{item.dilei}, #{item.lindiquanshu}, #{item.linmuquanshu}, #{item.projectType}, #{item.linzhong}, #{item.shiquandengji}, #{item.baohudengji}, #{item.dimao}, #{item.podu}, #{item.powei}, #{item.poxiang}, #{item.qiyuan}, #{item.youshishuzhong}, #{item.lingzu}, #{item.yubidu}, #{item.jingjilinchanqi}, #{item.meigongqingzhushu}, #{item.meigongqingchuji}, #{item.xiaobanchujiliang}, #{item.sipangshuzhushu}, #{item.sipangshuchuji}, #{item.lvhuahzushu}, #{item.lvhuachuji}, #{item.sanshengmuzhushu}, #{item.sanshengmuchuji}, #{item.sanshengzhuzhushu}, #{item.shidi}, #{item.huangmoleixing}, #{item.huangmochengdu}, #{item.shahualeixing}, #{item.shahuachengdu}, #{item.shididengji}, #{item.pointX}, #{item.pointY}, #{item.maxX}, #{item.maxY}, #{item.minX}, #{item.minY} )

insert into resource_xb ( id, shape, area, perimeter, xbln, xblnId, xianju, xiangzhenchang, xingzhengcun, linbanhao, xiaobanhao, suoshuxian, suoshuxiangzhen, keyWord, mianji, tufuhao, guidaohao, jieshoushijian, senlinleibie, dilei, lindiquanshu, linmuquanshu, projectType, linzhong, shiquandengji, baohudengji, dimao, podu, powei, poxiang, qiyuan, youshishuzhong, lingzu, yubidu, jingjilinchanqi, meigongqingzhushu, meigongqingchuji, xiaobanchujiliang, sipangshuzhushu, sipangshuchuji, lvhuahzushu, lvhuachuji, sanshengmuzhushu, sanshengmuchuji, sanshengzhuzhushu, shidi, huangmoleixing, huangmochengdu, shahualeixing, shahuachengdu, shididengji, pointX, pointY, maxX, maxY, minX, minY ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, GeomFromText(#{item.shape}), #{item.area}, #{item.perimeter}, #{item.xbln}, #{item.xblnId}, #{item.xianju}, #{item.xiangzhenchang}, #{item.xingzhengcun}, #{item.linbanhao}, #{item.xiaobanhao}, #{item.suoshuxian}, #{item.suoshuxiangzhen}, #{item.keyWord}, #{item.mianji}, #{item.tufuhao}, #{item.guidaohao}, #{item.jieshoushijian}, #{item.senlinleibie}, #{item.dilei}, #{item.lindiquanshu}, #{item.linmuquanshu}, #{item.projectType}, #{item.linzhong}, #{item.shiquandengji}, #{item.baohudengji}, #{item.dimao}, #{item.podu}, #{item.powei}, #{item.poxiang}, #{item.qiyuan}, #{item.youshishuzhong}, #{item.lingzu}, #{item.yubidu}, #{item.jingjilinchanqi}, #{item.meigongqingzhushu}, #{item.meigongqingchuji}, #{item.xiaobanchujiliang}, #{item.sipangshuzhushu}, #{item.sipangshuchuji}, #{item.lvhuahzushu}, #{item.lvhuachuji}, #{item.sanshengmuzhushu}, #{item.sanshengmuchuji}, #{item.sanshengzhuzhushu}, #{item.shidi}, #{item.huangmoleixing}, #{item.huangmochengdu}, #{item.shahualeixing}, #{item.shahuachengdu}, #{item.shididengji}, #{item.pointX}, #{item.pointY}, #{item.maxX}, #{item.maxY}, #{item.minX}, #{item.minY} )
